title: Harassment-Free Workplace
questionText: 1. Verbal, physical or visual conduct that unreasonably interferes with an employee’s work performance or creates a hostile work environment is harassment
instructionText: Choose the correct option and submit your choice by clicking “Done”.
questionText1: 2. The examples previously listed are the only behavior that are considered forms of harassment
instructionText1: Choose the correct option and submit your choice by clicking “Done”.

feedbackText1.firstIncorrect:
Incorrect:
A hostile work environment is a form of workplace harassment. It is any words or conduct that unreasonably interferes with someone's work performance or creates an intimidating, hostile, or offensive working environment.
